topic: Thesis Registration and Timing for Master's Program

correspondence.message: Hi, I have a couple of questions about the thesis: 1) Do I need to do anything for thesis registration? As far as I know, the supervisor does the registering. 2) Does the 4 months begin directly after registering or can I begin some time after registering? 3) If I want to begin my master's in the summer semester, until when must my thesis be finished?"

Your supervisor or chair will register your thesis in the CIT portal, and you will receive an email to confirm the data for further processing. The 4 months begin on the date entered by the supervisor in the CIT portal, who can register your thesis up to 2 weeks in advance. Ideally, your thesis should be finished and graded by the end of the winter semester (March/beginning of April) to start your master's in the summer.
